justification: "Next, to measure belief in the visibility of personality traits in facial appearance, participants completed the physiognomic belief scale (Jaeger et al., 2019b)."

measured_by: Novel Legal Sentencing Task with manipulated facial trustworthiness
justification: "We created a novel legal sentencing task, tailored to measure reliance on facial stereotypes… Participants indicated sentencing decisions for all ten cases."
"After each ruling, participants also indicated their confidence in the ruling on a scale that ranged from 1 (not confident at all) to 9 (extremely confident)."

measured_by: Trait ratings from the Chicago Face Database
justification: "The database includes ratings of all targets on various trait dimensions… we selected the ten individuals who received the lowest and highest ratings on perceived trustworthiness."
